title.rendered: A&A Associate gets featured in Khaleej Times : Offer free legal consultancy for new Emirati entrepreneurs

content.rendered: The leading online and offline news media, Khaleej Times, which offers complete UAE and international news coverage, has featured A&A Associate in their latest article. It highlights the initiative taken by A&A Associate to offer free legal consultation for new Emarati entrepreneurs who plan to take advantage of the recently launched paid sabbatical plan for Emirati government employees.

excerpt.rendered:
Dubai: Over a dozen expat business owners from different walks of life and nationalities got together at a special event on Monday ahead of the International Women’s Day to pay rich tributes to UAE for empowering them.

Learn More
